titles.title: Lifetime Income For Employees Act
Lifetime Income For Employees Act
To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to permit default investment arrangements in annuities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: Lifetime Income For Employees Act This bill allows fiduciaries of pension plans to make default investment arrangements in annuity contracts upon providing certain notice to plan participants or beneficiaries and complying with certain prohibitions on liquidity restrictions.
